title: Julie Walters
summary: Dame Julia Mary Walters DBE (born 22 February 1950), known professionally as Julie Walters, is an English actress, author, and comedian. She is the recipient of four British Academy Television Awards, two British Academy Film Awards, two International Emmy Awards, a BAFTA Fellowship, and a Golden Globe.  Walters has been nominated twice for an Academy Award, once for Best Actress and once for Best Supporting Actress.
